segments.text: Like a cat on hot bricks , as you might say . I don ’ t believe you are listening at all .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , I just worried about him . You know , he should be here an hour ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don ’ t worry him , he has been grown up and I think he can take himself very well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But he still does not come back .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe he is on the way home now .
segments.speaker: S1
